ygData.msgSnippet: Why is KitKat ignoring me? I still don t undersatnd, why did you bring me back to this world? Technosis asked Psuedo. Psuedo growled. I am sorry, if you

"Why is KitKat ignoring me? I still don't undersatnd, why did you bring me
back to this world?" Technosis asked Psuedo. Psuedo growled.

'I am sorry, if you wish I could kill you and put you at peace again."
Psuedo said.

"NO! Life is too precious, I'd prefer to mourn and torture myself slowly
then die." Technosis said. Atma was once like that, that was before he
became a general and had something to live for. He felt sorry for Technosis,
but not in a way that he wanted to stay away from her. He wanted to be
involved in this war someway, even is here he wasn't being treated like the
general he was...
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, September 11, 2000 10:39 AM
Subject: Re: Land Mine Alive?!


>
> ::KitKat::
>
> She glared at Psuedo and  Atma. "Will all of you stop this petty
> bickering.  We have other things to worry about.  Get the wounded
> fixed up.  We then need to find another base and get ourselves
> organized.  Then we need to get revenge on the Maximals for all they
> have done to us.  If you survive to that point, then you can fight
> amongst yourselves, not until then!"  She winced at the pain in her
> leg.  She noticed she was standing in a pool of fluid already.  She
> reached out and took Drillbit's shoulder to stabilize herself. "And
> now if you will pardon me, I need to get fixed up."  She then limpoed
> to the CR room.  She sat in a chair next to the chamber to catch her
> breath.  She grimaced in pain as it surged through her.
>
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > > ::DrillBit::
> > >
> > > DrillBit looked at Psuedo.
> > > "Kit doesn't even know she ever new a Land Mine or a Time Bomb.
> The
> > only
> > > thing I could do too cure her insanity was to either erase the
> > memorys
> > > of Land Mine and Time Bomb, or compleatly reprogram her. I erased
> > the
> > > memorys."
>
